nodes.text: An energy projector was device capable of transmitting a immobilizer beam. The projector was capable of knocking out various technologies such as starships and droids. The Jablogian crime lord, Azmorigan attempted to sell one to the Millennium Falcon's captain, Han Solo. According to Azmorigan, the projector could knock out technologies such as starfighters and astromech droids.
Energy projectors were first mentioned in Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords: Prima Official Game Guide. It later appeared in the canon comic Powered Down, Part I.
